Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

cnbrrr 0.1.1

cnbrrr 0.1.0.9000

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.
  • arad_get_data() gains a dest_dir argument to store data locally; it can also be set via a global option.
  • quieter CSV reading
